item.title: Cyberdefenders · Digital Forensics · Lgdroid
item.description: The Scenario: Our IR team took a disk dump of the android phone.

item.title: Cyberdefenders · Digital Forensics · Seized
item.description: The Scenario: Using Volatility, utilize your memory analysis skills as a security blue team analyst to Investigate the provided Linux memory snapshots and figure out attack details.

item.title: Cyberdefenders · Digital Forensics · Redline
item.description: The Scenario: As a member of the Security Blue team, your assignment is to analyze a memory dump using Redline and Volatility tools.

item.title: Cyberdefenders · Digital Forensics · NintendoHunt
item.description: This is my proposed solution for the cyberdefenders’s challenge NintendoHunt (difficult) published on April 27, 2023.

item.title: Cyberdefenders · Digital Forensics · Azurepot
item.description: This is my proposed solution for the cyberdefenders’s challenge AzurePot published on April 20, 2023.
